betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oNormally, when working with patterns for 'normal' recipes, you just need one interface.
To encode these recipes, you need two blocks! 

The packager is the first! You should put your first package recipe holder in a packager.

These can be placed anywhere in your AE2 network, but for organization it's a good idea to put them close to their respective unpackager.
